document.heading: Income and Franchise Tax Amendment Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-145, the “Income and Franchise Tax Amendment Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-475, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 14, 1988 and June 28, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 30, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-197 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
